code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';import"./header.css";import logoWhite from'../../assets/logo_white.png';import{useNavigate,useLocation,Link}from'react-router-dom';import MenuLateral from'../menu_lateral/menuLateral';import{useAuth}from'../../context/authContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HeaderComponente(){const{id,logout,autorizacao}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const headerRef=useRef(null);const[mostrarButton,setButton]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{if(headerRef.current){if(location.pathname==="/login"){setButton(false);headerRef.current.style.backgroundColor="transparent";}else if(id!==null){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);headerRef.current.style.backgroundColor="#2e8b57";}}},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{ref:headerRef,className:"padrao_header",children:[mostrarButton&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo_nome",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logoWhite,id:"logo_img",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"hotel_name",href:"*",children:"HOTEL GREEN GARDEN"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login_menu",children:[mostrarButton&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"login_button",onClick:()=>navigate('/login'),children:"LOGIN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuLateral,{})]})})]})]});}export default HeaderComponente;
